title: High School Physics Understanding Enhancement Course Through Laboratory Inquiry and Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of high school-level physics concepts and quantitative reasoning skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining experimental inquiry and computer simulations.

learning_goals: Enhances observational and analytical skills of physical phenomena through Laboratory Inquiry-Based Experiments (LIBEs)
Visualizes abstract physics concepts using Interactive Computer-Based Simulations (ICBSs)
Experiences reduced cognitive load compared to traditional lecture-based instruction
Achieves over 80% proficiency in summative assessments after short-term intensive learning
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
